room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by Red Door Escape Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Fun room with a great theme. The puzzles were solid and required some thought. For our team, it was a little easier than we normally do, but it was still a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by Red Door Escape Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Our group was a little disappointed as some of the clues/props did not work in the WILD WEST. I hope the staff can correct them for future customers

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by Red Door Escape Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I loved it! My group of dumb friends and I decided to play Wild West and boy lemme tell ya, it’s fun and there’s puzzles there that has me stump and I like to think I’m a pretty good escapee. We had Zach (Zack? Sorry I didn’t ask him how to spell his name) as a game master and THANK GOD we did. He helped us out so much, had it not been for him our dumb selves wouldn’t have been able to make it out of the first room. The staff there is nice as well. Christian (girl) told me I was beautiful and I can do anything I wanted to before I left and honestly I kinda needed that after seeing how dumb my group is.

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by Red Door Escape Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The staff was friendly and helpful. We had fun as a family. We did the wild west escape which was a multi room escape.
